name: 高等計算機網路
goals: 了解各項新興進階網路系統與應用技術
專題研究- 針對特定主題進行深入研究
成果發表- 期末報告與成果展示
能培養學生獨立閱讀論文的能力
能建立學生口頭表達能力
能建立學生專業領域知識
能培養學生正確思考批判的能力
syllabus:
英語授課

(\*Subjecttochanges)

Week1:Courseadmin

Week2~5: InternetMeasurement 

Week6:SurveyPapers/ProjectDiscussion

Week7~9:MobileandSensingSystems

Week10:Project/SurveyCheckPoint

Week11:RemoteSensingandUAVSystems

Week12:Project/SurveyCheckPoint

Week13:CrowdsensingSystems

Week14~16:DelayTolerantNetworks

Week17:Projectpresentation/demo

Week18:(tentative)ProjectReportdue,ProjectSlidesdue
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
